verses.verse: Thus the heavens <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> were finished, <WH3615> and all <WH3605> the host <WH6635> of them.

And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> God <WH430> ended <WH3615> his work <WH4399> which <WH834> he had made; <WH6213> and he rested <WH7673> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> from all <WH4480> <WH3605> his work <WH4399> which <WH834> he had made. <WH6213>

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH853> the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> and sanctified <WH6942> it: because <WH3588> that in it he had rested <WH7673> from all <WH4480> <WH3605> his work <WH4399> which <WH834> God <WH430> created <WH1254> and made. <WH6213>

These <WH428> are the generations <WH8435> of the heavens <WH8064> and of the earth <WH776> when they were created, <WH1254> in the day <WH3117> that the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> made <WH6213> the earth <WH776> and the heavens, <WH8064>

And every <WH3605> plant <WH7880> of the field <WH7704> before <WH2962> it was <WH1961> in the earth, <WH776> and every <WH3605> herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704> before <WH2962> it grew: <WH6779> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> had not <WH3808> caused it to rain <WH4305> upon <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> and there was not <WH369> a man <WH120> to till <WH5647> <WH853> the ground. <WH127>
But there went up <WH5927> a mist <WH108> from <WH4480> the earth, <WH776> and watered <WH8248> <WH853> the whole <WH3605> face <WH6440> of the ground. <WH127>

And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> <WH853> man <WH120> of the dust <WH6083> of <WH4480> the ground, <WH127> and breathed <WH5301> into his nostrils <WH639> the breath <WH5397> of life; <WH2416> and man <WH120> became <WH1961> a living <WH2416> soul. <WH5315>

And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> planted <WH5193> a garden <WH1588> eastward <WH4480> <WH6924> in Eden; <WH5731> and there <WH8033> he put <WH7760> <WH853> the man <WH120> whom <WH834> he had formed. <WH3335>

And out of <WH4480> the ground <WH127> made the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> to grow <WH6779> every <WH3605> tree <WH6086> that is pleasant <WH2530> to the sight, <WH4758> and good <WH2896> for food; <WH3978> the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> also in the midst <WH8432> of the garden, <WH1588> and the tree <WH6086> of knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil. <WH7451>

And a river <WH5104> went out <WH3318> of Eden <WH4480> <WH5731> to water <WH8248> <WH853> the garden; <WH1588> and from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> it was parted, <WH6504> and became <WH1961> into four <WH702> heads. <WH7218>

The name <WH8034> of the first <WH259> is Pison: <WH6376> that is it <WH1931> which compasseth <WH5437> <WH853> the whole <WH3605> land <WH776> of Havilah, <WH2341> where <WH834> <WH8033> there is gold; <WH2091>
And the gold <WH2091> of that <WH1931> land <WH776> is good: <WH2896> there <WH8033> is bdellium <WH916> and the onyx <WH7718> stone. <WH68>
And the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> river <WH5104> is Gihon: <WH1521> the same <WH1931> is it that compasseth <WH5437> <WH853> the whole <WH3605> land <WH776> of Ethiopia. <WH3568>

And the name <WH8034> of the third <WH7992> river <WH5104> is Hiddekel: <WH2313> that is it <WH1931> which goeth <WH1980> toward the east <WH6926> of Assyria. <WH804> And the fourth <WH7243> river <WH5104> is Euphrates. <WH6578>
And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> took <WH3947> <WH853> the man, <WH120> and put <WH5117> him into the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731> to dress <WH5647> it and to keep <WH8104> it.
And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH5921> the man, <WH120> saying, <WH559> Of every <WH4480> <WH3605> tree <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588> thou mayest freely eat: <WH398> <WH398>

But of the tree <WH4480> <WH6086> of the knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil, <WH7451> thou shalt not <WH3808> eat <WH398> of <WH4480> it: for <WH3588> in the day <WH3117> that thou eatest <WH398> thereof <WH4480> thou shalt surely die. <WH4191> <WH4191>
And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> said, <WH559> It is not <WH3808> good <WH2896> that the man <WH120> should be <WH1961> alone; <WH905> I will make <WH6213> him a help <WH5828> meet for him. <WH5048>

And out of <WH4480> the ground <WH127> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> and every <WH3605> fowl <WH5775> of the air; <WH8064> and brought <WH935> them unto <WH413> Adam <WH121> to see <WH7200> what <WH4100> he would call <WH7121> them: and whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> Adam <WH121> called <WH7121> every living <WH2416> creature, <WH5315> that <WH1931> was the name <WH8034> thereof.

And Adam <WH121> gave <WH7121> names <WH8034> to all <WH3605> cattle, <WH929> and to the fowl <WH5775> of the air, <WH8064> and to every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the field; <WH7704> but for Adam <WH121> there was not <WH3808> found <WH4672> a help <WH5828> meet for him. <WH5048>

And the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> caused a deep sleep <WH8639> to fall <WH5307> upon <WH5921> Adam, <WH121> and he slept: <WH3462> and he took <WH3947> one <WH259> of his ribs, <WH4480> <WH6763> and closed up <WH5462> the flesh <WH1320> instead <WH8478> thereof;

And <WH853> the rib, <WH6763> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> had taken <WH3947> from <WH4480> man, <WH120> made <WH1129> he a woman, <WH802> and brought <WH935> her unto <WH413> the man. <WH120>

And Adam <WH121> said, <WH559> This <WH2063> is now <WH6471> bone <WH6106> of my bones, <WH4480> <WH6106> and flesh <WH1320> of my flesh: <WH4480> <WH1320> she <WH2063> shall be called <WH7121> Woman, <WH802> because <WH3588> she <WH2063> was taken <WH3947> out of Man. <WH4480> <WH376>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> shall a man <WH376> leave <WH5800> <WH853> his father <WH1> and his mother, <WH517> and shall cleave <WH1692> unto his wife: <WH802> and they shall be <WH1961> one <WH259> flesh. <WH1320>
And they were <WH1961> both <WH8147> naked, <WH6174> the man <WH120> and his wife, <WH802> and were not <WH3808> ashamed. <WH954>
